messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Collision Alert

Nanotrasen Superweapons Division is testing a new prototype nova tank, some mild debris is expected.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: High mortality rate detected, We're sending a investigative team to investigate

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Telecomms Server Room.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Central Maintenance.
